title: LOL MRR and Win Rate
body:
Just wondering if there was any reliable sites to check your MMR and win % with champions. 
I've tried a few but they seem to be telling me different stories.

replies.body: Like the others have said, OP.GG is everyone's go to for their "MMR". However, take any number it pops out at your with a grain of salt as it is likely to be inaccurate and not reflective of your actual MMR (as Riot haven't released the algorithm for the MMR calculation to the public). The number shown on these sites is usually just a ballpark estimate.
I find OP.GG Takes a really long time to update stats.
I've found it can really vary with the updates. Sometimes it will be within minutes and other times it take hours. I guess it all depends on the interaction with Riot API.

Generally, the most reliable is considered to be OP.GG, if I'm not mistaken.

Different sites will give you different values more often than not, because they tend to use different methods of calculating MMR.

Lolking and oce.op.gg are good sights to check MMR and winrate, as well as other stats. If you're looking for champion specific stats go on lol.skill, if you're looking for champion stats pertaining to the game overall look to champion.gg
